# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```
function wrap_string(text::String, text_width::Int = 10)
    line = ""
    for word in split(text, " ")
        if length(word) > text_width
            line *= "\n"
            line += word[:text_width]
            line += " "
        else
            line *= " "
            line += word
        end
    end
    return line
end
```
Example:
```
julia> wrap_string("This is a long sentence that will be wrapped into multiple lines because it exceeds the text width of 10.")
"This is a long sentence that will be wrapped into multiple lines because it exceeds the text width of 10."
```
